synopsis.text: Tank enthusiasts and anime fans alike are in for a treat as Bandai Namco celebrates the release of the Girls & Panzer TV & OVA 5.1ch Blu-ray Disc BOX set with a brand new installment of Akiyama Yukari's Tank Course 'Extra'. This special feature, packed with nearly half an hour of engaging content, was made available on Bandai Namco's official YouTube channel. A sneak peek of the video, running for approximately 7 minutes, was previously offered, giving viewers a tantalizing taste of what's to come. For those eager to enjoy the full, non-watermarked version, it will be included in the BD Box set, set to hit the shelves on December 21, 2018.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
